sourcesContent: import { Component,OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from '../recipe.model'; import { RecipeService } from '../recipe.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-list', templateUrl: './recipe-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-list.component.css'] }) export class RecipeListComponent implements OnInit { recipes: Recipe[]; constructor(private recipeService: RecipeService, private router:Router) { } ngOnInit() { this.recipes = this.recipeService.getRecipes(); } // onRecipeSelected(recipe: Recipe){ // this.recipeWasSelected.emit(recipe); // } onNewRecipe(){ this.router.navigate([]); } }
